article.title: Čo to obnáša napísať dobrú Arduino knižnicu?
article.author: Vladimír Záhradník
article.excerpt: Arduino knižnice by sa mali dať jednoducho používať, mali by byť dobré zdokumentované a pokryté unit testami. Ako sa to robí?

authors.bio:
Hi there, I'm Vladimír. I work as a freelance software engineer; at the time,
I focus mostly on mobile and embedded development. I always strive to overcome my
limits — that is the reason why I'm so interested in startups and entrepreneurship.
Also, I love music, especially live events in the clubs.
authors.name: Vladimír Záhradník
